text: David Benioff and D. B. Weiss'projects will be separate from Rian Johnson's upcoming trilogy and the Skywalker saga. Game of Thrones creators David Benioff and D. B. Weiss are joining the Star Wars galaxy. The duo will write and produce a new series of films, Disney and Lucasfilm announced Tuesday. “ David and Dan are some of the best storytellers working today, ” Lucasfilm president Kathleen Kennedy said in a statement. “ Their command of complex characters, depth of story and richness of mythology will break new ground and boldly push Star Wars in ways I find incredibly exciting. ” The new film series will be separate from the trilogy that The Last Jedi director Rian Johnson is developing, and will also stand alone from the Skywalker Saga, which J.
